name: Habib Khara
story: Karim grew up in a small village in rural Iran. He joined the military as soon as he turned 18 and has been serving in the army ever since. His skills as a missile specialist are highly valued by his team and he has earned several commendations for his bravery on the battlefield. Karim is fiercely loyal to his comrades and will do whatever it takes to protect them. Outside of his duties, he enjoys reading and listening to Persian classical music with his wife and two children.
